A candle-making workshop: Host a workshop where participants can learn the art of candle-making, from selecting the perfect wax and wick to crafting unique and beautiful designs. Participants will leave with their very own handmade candles and the knowledge to create more.

Candle-themed escape room: Create an immersive escape room experience where participants must solve puzzles and clues to escape a room filled with candles of all shapes and sizes. The room will be designed to resemble a cozy candle-lit parlor, complete with plush furniture and soft lighting.

Candle-making subscription box: Offer a subscription box service where customers receive a new, unique candle each month. The candles can be customized to suit different moods and occasions, such as a relaxing lavender scent for a stressful day or a festive peppermint scent for the holiday season.

Candle-inspired art exhibit: Curate an art exhibit featuring works of art inspired by candles. Artists can create sculptures, paintings, or installations that incorporate candles as a central theme, showcasing the versatility and beauty of the simple candle.

Candle-themed cooking class: Host a cooking class where participants can learn how to create dishes inspired by the different scents and flavors of candles. For example, a lavender-scented candle could inspire a lavender shortbread recipe, while a pine-scented candle could inspire a pineapple and ham stir-fry. The class will culminate in a candle-themed dinner party, complete with candle-lit tables and delicious dishes.
